parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Defines an action to execute on channel. The `action` key is always required. The rest of the keys are params depending on the chosen action. Read more on [Github Wiki](https://github.com/SUPLA/supla-cloud/wiki/Channel-Actions).

get.summary: Get schedules list of the channel

enabled.description: `true` if the location is enabled, `false` otherwise

locationsIds.description: array containing the location idenfifiers assigned to this access ID

clientAppsIds.description: array containing the client apps idenfifiers assigned to this access ID

locations.description: Returned only if requested by the `include` parameter.

clientApps.description: Returned only if requested by the `include` parameter.

channelNumber.description: Channel ordinal number in its IO Device

altIcon.description: Chosen alternative icon idenifier. Should not be greater than `funciton.maxAlternativeIconIndex`

hidden.description: Whether this channel is shown on client apps or not

inheritedLocation.description: Whether this channel inherits its IO Device's location (`true`) or not (`false`)

hidden.description: Whether this channel group is shown on client apps or not

channels.description: Returned only if requested by the `include` parameter.

altIcon.description: Chosen alternative icon idenifier. Should not be greater than `funciton.maxAlternativeIconIndex`

output.description: Whether the channel is output type (i.e. can take action) or input (i.e. provide data)

possibleActions.description: What can you with with this channel?

ChannelParam.description: Configuration of the channel behavior. Value meaning depends on the chosen channel function. See more details on [Github Wiki](https://github.com/SUPLA/supla-cloud/wiki/Channel-Functions-parameters).

channels.description: Returned only if requested by the `include` parameter.

schedules.description: Returned only if requested by the `include` parameter.

enabled.description: `true` if the location is enabled, `false` otherwise

iodevicesIds.description: array containing the IO Devices identifiers assigned to this location

channelGroupsIds.description: array containing the Channel groups identifiers assigned to this location

channelsIds.description: array containing the Channels identifiers expicitely assigned to this location

accessIdsIds.description: array containing the Access Identifiers identifiers assigned to this location

password.description: Location password (plain text). Returned only if requested by the `include` parameter.

iodevices.description: Returned only if requested by the `include` parameter.

channelGroups.description: Returned only if requested by the `include` parameter.

accessIds.description: Returned only if requested by the `include` parameter.

channels.description: Returned only if requested by the `include` parameter.

timeExpression.description: Schedule time expression in crontab notation (with some custom additions).

closestExecutions.description: Returned only if requested by the `include` parameter. Contains two arrays of maximum 3 closest past and future executions.

timeExpression.description: Schedule time expression in crontab notation (with some custom additions).

address.description: SUPLA Server address (to be used in smartphones)

action.description: The `change:userTimezone` requires to provide also a `timezone` value in the request. The `change:password` requires to provide also a `newPassword` and `oldPassword` in the request.

password.description: Provide new password if you want to change it.

accessIdsIds.description: Access Identifiers identifiers to assign to this location.

schedules.description: Schedules that will be deleted after this request.

groups.description: Channel groups that this channel will be removed from after this request.

message.example: Cannot execute requested action on this channel.
The requested function is not available on this channel

humidity.description: Humidity percent. Available only if channel function is `HUMIDITYANDTEMPERATURE`.

enable.description: Array of schedule identifiers to enable

password.description: Provide new password if you want to change it.

locationsIds.description: Locations identifiers to assign to this Access ID.

clientAppsIds.description: Client Apps identifiers to assign to this Access ID. If client app is connected to any other Client ID, it will be disconnected from the old one before assigning.
